text: (ai rasool) dekho ye kuffaar (tumhaaree adaavat mein) apane seenon ko (goya) dohara kie daalate hain taaki khuda se (apanee baaton ko) chhipae rahen (magar) dekho jab ye log apane kapade khoob lapetate hain (tab bhee to) khuda (unakee baaton ko) jaanata hai jo chhipaakar karate hain aur khullam khulla karate hain isamen shaq nahin ki vah seenon ke bhed tak ko khoob jaanata hai
